resources.string: A ConstraintLayout is a example of a Layout

An example of a view is a Button
There are two types of LinearLayout, match_parent and wrap_content
An activity is a single, focused thing that the user can do
The default orientation of a LinearLayout is horizontal
TextViews are used to show images
All the strings resources must be stored in strings.xml

Android programming is done in Swift programming language
